courses.title: Introduction to Music Theory
courses.description: Comprehensive course on musical notation, scales, chords, and rhythm fundamentals.

courses.title: History of Classical Music
courses.description: Deep dive into classical music history, covering major composers and stylistic trends.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation
courses.description: Explore jazz theory and practice improvisation techniques over chord changes.

courses.title: Rock Guitar Techniques
courses.description: Master essential rock guitar skills like power chords, riffs, and solos across different rock styles.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Introduction to electronic music production, covering DAW basics, sound design, and mixing.

courses.title: Music Composition for Film and TV
courses.description: Learn to compose music for visual media, covering orchestration, scoring techniques, and synchronization.

courses.title: World Music Exploration
courses.description: Journey through diverse global music traditions, exploring cultural and historical contexts.

courses.title: Advanced Vocal Techniques
courses.description: Enhance vocal abilities with advanced singing techniques and styles.

courses.title: Music Business and Marketing
courses.description: Overview of the music industry, focusing on business and marketing essentials.

courses.title: Digital Audio Engineering
courses.description: Focused on the technical aspects of audio engineering, covering signal flow, mixing, and mastering.

courses.title: Songwriting Techniques
courses.description: Designed for aspiring songwriters, covering song structure, lyric writing, and melody creation.

courses.title: Percussion Techniques
courses.description: Fundamentals of playing percussion instruments, including rhythm, timing, and hand coordination.
